Task1.task_description: Implement a Product Management Component using FastAPI and SQLite
Task1.details:
Create a RESTful API for product management with the following features:
- FastAPI framework for API development
- SQLite database for data storage
- CRUD operations for products
- Proper project structure following FastAPI best practices
Technologies: Python 3.8+, FastAPI, SQLite, SQLAlchemy

Task1SubTask1.details:
Create the basic FastAPI project structure with all necessary directories and files:
- app/: Main application package
- app/api/: API routes
- app/models/: Database models
- app/services/: Business logic
- app/repositories/: Data access layer
- app/database.py: Database configuration
- app/main.py: Application entry point
- requirements.txt: Project dependencies

Task1SubTask2.details:
Create SQLAlchemy models for Product entity with fields:
- id
- name
- description
- price
- created_at
- updated_at
Implement database configuration and connection handling in database.py

Task1SubTask3.details:
Create ProductRepository class with CRUD operations:
- create_product
- get_product
- get_all_products
- update_product
- delete_product
Implement proper error handling and database interactions

Task1SubTask4.details:
Create ProductService class with business logic:
- create_product
- get_product
- get_all_products
- update_product
- delete_product
Include validation and error handling

Task1SubTask6.details:
Update project documentation with:
- Project overview
- Setup instructions
- API documentation
- Usage examples

Task1SubTask7.description: Integrate product routes with main FastAPI application
Task1SubTask7.details:
Update app/main.py to:
1. Import the product router from app/api/products.py
2. Include the router in the FastAPI application with appropriate prefix
3. Configure CORS if needed
4. Ensure proper dependency injection setup
5. Add error handlers if needed
